== Team Rules ==

These rules apply in any area that is under direct team ownership or control. This includes, but is not limited to, our IRC channel, the UA Tracker, subforum on the Ubuntu Forums, and team wiki pages.

* Members are expected to exemplify the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/about/about-ubuntu/conduct|Ubuntu Code of Conduct]]</nowiki> at all times at all times.
* Posts must be 2 hours old before they are considered Unanswered
* If team member is unable to answer, leaves thread un-bumped
